"Breaking Enemy Parts": "Some enemies have <c ffff00>parts that can be broken<c>."

"In \"Tundra Exploration\", you will encounter Snow Banther and Snow Banshee, whose claws and horns can be broken by dealing enough damage to them.

Breaking parts can have special effects, such as increasing drops or causing a boss to react in a special way."

"In the case of Snow Banther and Snow Banshee, breaking the claws on all four feet will cause their feet to slip after certain attacks, leaving them open.

This creates an ideal moment to attack, as well as giving you a chance to recover, so do your best to break parts wherever you can."
